section.name: Virtual Machines that Work with Harmony
section.p: Besides our own DRLVM virtual machine, there are also other virtual machines that work with the Apache Harmony classlibrary :

ul.li: IBM J9 : IBM has made their production-grade virtual machine available for project use under a non-open source, evaluation binary license. This VM works with the Harmony class library.
BEA JRockit : BEA has made their production-grade virtual machine available for project use under a non-open source, evaluation binary license. This VM works with the Harmony class library.

section.name: Other Projects
section.p: The following list is of other projects related to open source Java that you may find interesting.

We believe that open source is valuable because of the communities behind the code - and in the case of Apache Harmony, the the collaboration and interaction with these other projects brings additional health and diversity that go beyond a single project.
